home.title: Free Online Image Tool
home.subtitle: Convert, compress, and resize images instantly — right in your browser. No uploads, no sign-ups, 100% private.

converter.title: Converter

compressor.title: Compressor

resizer.title: Resizer

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your images in one place.

cta.title: Ready to supercharge your images?
cta.desc: No downloads, no sign-ups. Start processing images in seconds.

why.title: Why PixelSwift?
why.fastDesc: Powered by WebAssembly — images are processed instantly in your browser. No uploads, no queues.
why.secureDesc: Your files stay on your device. Nothing is uploaded to any server, ever.
why.freeDesc: All features, no limits, no watermarks. Free today, free tomorrow, free forever.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How to convert HEIC to JPG?
faq.a1: Select "Converter", upload your HEIC file, choose JPG format, and download.
faq.q2: Are my images uploaded to a server?
faq.a2: No. All processing happens locally in your browser. Your images never leave your device.
faq.q3: Is there a file size limit?
faq.a3: Each file can be up to 50MB. You can process up to 20 images at once.

upload.dragText: Drag & drop images here, or click to upload
upload.orBrowse: or click to browse from your computer
upload.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP, HEIC up to 25MB
upload.supportFormats: Supports: JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, BMP, TIFF
upload.pasteHint: You can also paste from clipboard (Ctrl+V)

converter.title: Universal Image Converter

compressor.title: Smart Image Compressor
compressor.subtitle: Reduce file size while maintaining quality. Perfect for PNG, JPG, and WEBP.
compressor.proTipText: WebP format can reduce file size by an additional 30% compared to JPG without noticeable quality loss.

errors.fileTooLarge: File exceeds {size}MB limit. Please try compressing it first.
errors.fileCorrupted: This file appears to be corrupted and cannot be read.
errors.processFailed: Processing failed. Please refresh the page and try again.
errors.browserNotSupported: Your browser doesn't support this feature. We recommend using Chrome.
errors.maxFilesExceeded: Maximum {count} files allowed. Only the first {count} will be processed.
